They include a new 76-story limestone tower with 93 apartments at 220 Central Park South developed by Vornado Realty Trust and a new 54-story condo at 520 Park Ave. developed by the brothers behind 15 Central Park West, the most successful New York City condo development ever.
Experts said uber-luxury new towers at the foot of Central Park will be the most closely watched of 2015, as they compete for the small pool of super wealthy buyers.
